info.title: Mock API
info.description: Mock OpenAPI spec for QR API Service. All endpoints require API key authentication via 'Authorization: Bearer <token>' or 'x-api-key: <token>' headers.

post.description: Issue OAuth2 access token using client credentials or password grant

get.description: Get current user/organization profile with roles and scopes
Get airline directory with IATA codes, prefixes, and names
Get airport directory with IATA/ICAO codes, cities, and timezones
Get commodity catalog with HS codes and UN numbers for dangerous goods
Get list of Special Handling Codes (SHC) for cargo
Get flight timetables and legs with dates and aircraft types
Get per-flight capacity snapshot with projected/actual kgs and volume

post.description: Create Request for Quote with origin, destination, pieces, weight, dimensions, commodity, and SHC

get.summary: List quotes or get quote details
get.description: Get list of quotes with optional filtering, or get specific quote details by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Quote ID to get specific quote details

200.description: Quotes list or single quote details

post.description: Airline submits price options for RFQ
Consignor submits price proposal using airline quote
ACA/EPO requests AWB stock allocation from airline

get.description: Get airline AWB stock allocations with prefixes, ranges, and validity

put.description: Airline replies to an AWB stock request with approval/rejection and allocation details

post.description: Create booking with FFR fields and reference to quote
Airline confirms, rejects, or provides alternative booking

get.description: Get flight booking list to share with GHA

post.description: Bulk ingestion of bookings from Airline FBL/XFBL.
Create and submit MAWB with FWB/XFWB data elements
Create and submit HAWB with FHL/XFZB data

post.summary: Send Status: Prepared for Loading (XFSU PRE)
post.description: Notify stakeholders that shipment is prepared for loading (XFSU PRE).
Upload ancillary documents (MSDS, COO, COI, etc.) to digital pouch
Submit electronic Dangerous Goods Declaration
Submit electronic Cargo Security Declaration
Submit Pre-Loading Advance Cargo Info
Submit electronic Dangerous Goods Declaration (e-DGD)
Transmit x-ray scan metadata + image to Customs.
Secondary screening outcome to Airline & Customs.
Upload bonded transit manifest to airline/GHA
Create and manage terminal slot bookings with VCT/TSP issuance
Push status events (RCS, MAN, DEP, ARR, etc.) with XFSU equivalents
Submit flight manifest with FFM/XFFM data
Report offloaded or short-shipped pieces

get.description: Get end-to-end tracking timeline with events and documents

post.description: Register endpoints for quotes, booking confirmations, status, and document events

get.description: Get authorization, data changes, and message exchange ledger
Get API usage statistics and rate limits per tenant

parameters.name: groupBy
parameters.description: Group by endpoint or other criteria

post.description: Ingest HAWB as a draft from XFZB/FHL sources before finalization.

errorDescription.example: No quotes found matching the specified criteria

requestId.description: Unique identifier for the stock request

status.description: Current status of the stock request

organizationId.description: Organization identifier that made the request

requestedStock.description: Number of AWB stock units requested

allocatedStock.description: Number of AWB stock units allocated (if any)

validityPeriod.description: Validity period in months as requested

validFrom.description: Validity start date for allocated stock

validTo.description: Validity end date for allocated stock

submittedAt.description: Timestamp when the request was submitted

processedAt.description: Timestamp when the request was processed (if applicable)

approvalNotes.description: Notes from the airline regarding approval/rejection

message.example: Requested stock must be between 1 and 10000

example.message: Requested stock must be between 1 and 10000

status.description: Reply status for the AWB stock request

allocatedStock.description: Number of AWB stock units allocated (0 if rejected)

startNumber.description: Starting AWB number in allocated range (if approved)

endNumber.description: Ending AWB number in allocated range (if approved)

validFrom.description: Validity start date for allocated stock

validTo.description: Validity end date for allocated stock

notes.example: Stock allocated as requested. Please ensure proper usage compliance.

rejectionReason.description: Reason for rejection (if status is rejected)

allocatedStock.description: Number of AWB stock units allocated

startNumber.description: Starting AWB number in allocated range

endNumber.description: Ending AWB number in allocated range

validFrom.description: Validity start date for allocated stock

validTo.description: Validity end date for allocated stock

repliedAt.description: Timestamp when the reply was submitted

notes.example: Stock allocated as requested. Please ensure proper usage compliance.

message.example: Allocated stock must be between 0 and requested amount

example.message: Allocated stock must be between 0 and requested amount
Status must be one of: approved, rejected, partially_approved

quoteId.description: Quote identifier from the pricing response

pieces.description: Number of pieces in the shipment
Number of pieces with these dimensions

unNumber.description: UN number for the dangerous goods

properShippingName.description: Proper shipping name as per IATA DGR

limitedQuantity.description: Whether goods are in limited quantity

exceptedQuantity.description: Whether goods are in excepted quantity

shipperDeclaration.example: I hereby declare that the contents of this consignment are fully and accurately described above by the proper shipping name and are classified, packaged, marked and labeled/placarded and are in all respects in proper condition for transport according to applicable international and national governmental regulations.

submittedAt.description: Timestamp when the declaration was submitted

message.example: UN number must be in format UN followed by 4 digits

example.message: UN number must be in format UN followed by 4 digits
Hazard class must be between 1 and 9
